metadata.synopsis: A policeman (Nick Mancuso), his girlfriend (Kathryn Harrold) and a scientist (David Warner) track vampire bats on an Indian reservation.

reviews: Maybe one of the reasons American Cinema in the seventies was so great is because we could expect to see Strother Martin four times a year.
NIGHTWING isn't a great horror movie per se, but it's a pretty great movie full stop, one that deserves a much bigger cult fanbase.
Dull, slow paced horror about vampire bats is forgettable.
...and still we wait for that one great "killer bats" movie.
